page.title: 08Physical Recreation.
page.content: Sporting facilities in Stowmarket cover a very wide range of activities. A large proportion of them take place in the Mid Suffolk Sports Centre in Gainsborough Road. It stays open for seven days a week and caters for all age groups. Here is an outline of typical activities - Mondays- karate, gymnastics, weight training. Tuesdays- aerobics, circuit training, over 50's keep fit. Wednesdays- badminton, weight training. Thursdays- judo, football. Fridays- judo, badminton . Saturdays- junior football, gymnastics. An indoor swimming pool is being built nearby. In addition there are separate clubs for bowls, cricket, football, rugby, tennis and rambling.
